summary: Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.
cast: Colm Meaney|Donal O'Kelly|Ger Ryan|Caroline Rothwell|Neilí Conroy|Rúaidhrí Conroy|Brendan O'Carroll|Stuart Dunne|Jack Lynch|Laurie Morton|Marie Mullen|Jon Kenny|Moses Rowen|Linda McGovern|Eoin Chaney|Frank O'Sullivan|Jill Doyle|Barbara Bergin|Charlotte Bradley|Ronan Wilmot|Stanley Townsend|Sheila Flitton|Alan King|Bernie Downes|Martin Dunne|Tommy O'Neill|Eilish Moore|Paul Raynor|Eileen Walsh|Sandra Bagnall|Fionnuala Murphy|Michael O'Reilly|David Kelly|Lee Bagnall|Jamie Bagnall|David Byrne|Gavin Kelty|Claude Clancy|Michelle Gallagher|Arthur Napper|Jessie O'Gorman|Sean O'Donovan
title: La camioneta
